headline: House Urges Intelligence Officials to Testify Publicly
abstract: The officials appear reluctant to attend an annual hearing after last year’s testimony revealed splits with the White House on key issues and angered President Trump.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Representative Adam B. Schiff, the chairman of the House Intelligence Committee, issued invitations on Thursday to intelligence agency leaders to testify publicly in an effort to head off an attempt to move their yearly hearing on global threats behind closed doors.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
Office of the Director of National Intelligence
